title: I just got exactly 100k Taric mastery.
body: Can I join the cool kids club now :c.

replies.body:
Your achievement is truly outrageous.

Truly,

truly,

truly outrageous.
You know what you could do to be really awesome?  Tell Repetoir to release Taric.  We need the gems back on the rift.

>

*Checks for goatee*
6 Skins and a Cinematic

For a moment I was about to lose faith in Riot. Never again.

If only ... it could be ... MORE outrageous.
Is there any way they could make it *not* outrageous? Other than removing the leg warmers, of course.

Will Taric be OPPPPPPPPPPPPP?
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
I picked up Taric in ranked to use his anti-autism heal to help my friend climb a little, is his really good heal staying?  Can we learn that much about him?

> [{quoted}](name=CaptainIzayoi,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=RLpcHtAg,comment-id=0009000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-10T19:46:21.123+0000)
>
> I picked up Taric in ranked to use his anti-autism heal to help my friend climb a little, is his really good heal staying?  Can we learn that much about him?

They've said they want to keep heal, stun, allied armor buff in his kit. Though things will be swapping around a bit.

> [{quoted}](name=Kindlejack,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=RLpcHtAg,comment-id=000900000000,timestamp=2015-11-10T18:58:32.767+0000)
>
> We are actively working on Taric!

Oh God please don't. Taric is in a good spot right now he's super sleeper OP as a support champion and even more so as a top laner. If you release him he will be yet another overloaded kit with mobility, permaCC, %hp bullshit, and other things that you guys really need to stop putting in every single fucking kit ever.

I love how people think once a Rioter replies they have to bring up something gameplay/champion related. They are people too that enjoy memes and having a fun time without someone always harassing them
boards in a nutshell

I thought it was called the fabulous club? 

BUT YAY TARIC
What the hell are you doing woth your life man???!?!?!?!

Fucker you just became the leader of the club.

Special snowflake here
dats sexy {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
You have become truly outrageous.  {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

Wanna really be the definition of cool?

Get 250k on {{champion:75}} and 150k on {{champion:122}} then come talk to me.
Normally I associate those champions with meanie-faces
That was the joke....

> [{quoted}](name=Jelly Mac,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=RLpcHtAg,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-11-10T06:35:14.864+0000)

400k on {{champion:27}} 
get on my level {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Senpai SirHcez, is that you?
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

So you rely on getting carried because you pick an outclassed champion alot?
"Look at me, I make my team suffer so I can reach a high mastery on a useless champion!"

You've never had your face smashed in by a full armor solo top Taric, have you?
Oh the joy of being inocent :')

awww how sweet. What will you do, spam your joke till I give up?
Some Champions were never Meta because of good reasons. Taric WAS a good pick, then he got nerfed. 
You MIGHT win, but then it is because you are way better than your lane enemy, and with ANY other pick, you would have won much easier.

I picture you wanking off while drooling every time you mention the word "Meta".
I'll give you a tip: Fun, Skill, Knowledge of the game, Farming, Proper itemization. Those factors are what drive the game.

"awww how sweet, this little kiddo thinks his 550AD Darius can damage my 400armor Taric, ayy lmao"
"awww how sweet, this Zed thinks he's relevant"
"awww how sweet, poor Yasuo killing himself off of my Sunfire Cape and Thronmail, ayy lmao"

I don't want to win easier, I want to smash your face in with my OP Taric, because Taric does what Taric does best; being outrageous. And then he got nerfed, and I didn't give a flying fuck, because I'll keep stacking my armor, and smash your face in.
K?

Listen Buddy, I never said you cant do good with Taric top lane. All I said is that when you actually manage to dominate with Taric, you could have done it way easier with other champions. And you really need to be way better than the guy you fight. With equal skill and him picking a viable champion, you will lose.

As long as you keep him in normal games, its k.
I support this message! Also vote Donald Trump for president 2083.
Can't wait to rock out new Taric with my truly outrageous Taric skins. Will be looking fabulous!
Respect
Fabulous {{item:3070}} {{champion:44}} {{item:3070}}

This man should just get all the Taric skins for free. Such Fabulousness
Fabulous
